* Update demo to show splitting tests per stage (#32) @abayer

## 👻 Maintenance

* Set up [JEP-229](https://github.com/jenkinsci/jep/tree/master/jep/229) - (#179) @Vlatombe
* Move away from deprecated Release Drafter App (#174) @NotMyFault
* Update Dependabot config file (#129) @dependabot
